sourcesContent:
<template>
  <header>
    <v-app-bar
        fixed
        dark
        dense
        style="background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(44, 4, 106), rgb(196,26,143))"
        shrink-on-scroll
        :height="`${initHeight()}px`"
        src='../../../../../assets/images/header.png'
        scroll-target="#scrolling-techniques-2"
        fade-img-on-scroll
        collapse-on-scroll
        scroll-threshold="400"
        app
        class="flex-row"
    >
      <v-btn
        icon
        class="mx-2"
        @click="setDrawer"
      >
        <v-icon
          :size="iconsSize">
          mdi-menu
        </v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-toolbar-title class="header__title">
        Heavify
      </v-toolbar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn
        icon
      >
        <v-icon :size="iconsSize">
          mdi-login-variant
        </v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </v-app-bar>
    <v-navigation-drawer
        v-model="drawer"
        absolute
        temporary
        color="secondary"
    >
      <v-list
          nav
          dense
      >
        <v-list-item-group active-class="deep-purple--text text--accent-4">
          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon>mdi-home</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-title>Home</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>

          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon>mdi-account</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-title>Account</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list-item-group>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>
  </header>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    drawer: false
  }),
  computed: {
    iconsSize() {
      console.log(this.$vuetify.breakpoint);
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case 'xs': return 13;
        case 'sm': return 18;
        case 'md': return 22;
        case 'lg': return 25;
        case 'xl': return 30;
      }
    },
  },
  methods: {
    setDrawer() {
      this.drawer = !this.drawer;
    },
    initHeight() {
      let currentWidth = this.$vuetify.breakpoint.width;
      let currentHeight = this.$vuetify.breakpoint.height;
      let difference;
      if (currentWidth >= currentHeight) {
        difference = (currentWidth / currentHeight + 0.5);
        return currentHeight / (difference);
      }
      else {
        difference = (currentHeight / currentWidth + 1.5);
        return currentWidth / difference;
      }
    },
    onHandleResize(event) {
      console.log(event);
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .v-toolbar__title {
    font-family: "Absolute Empire", sans-serif;
  }
</style>
